start.intro: Hello {username}! 👋🏻 Welcome to BW Monastery 🎉🎉 Let’s embark on an exciting journey with our puzzle hunt, "The Lost Mooncake Recipe." 您好 {username}！ 👋🏻 欢迎您到吉祥宝聚寺 🎉🎉 让我们踏上一段激动人心的旅程，开始我们的寻宝游戏【失落的月饼食谱】

rules: Prepare yourself for a thrilling adventure filled with challenges and mysteries as you search for the secrets of this ancient and coveted recipe. Ready to begin? Type 'READY' and the first stage will be sent. Good luck.

text: Stage 1: The following riddle will guide you to where you seek. "In the garden of stones, where virtues align, Children’s play turns to deeds divine. A blossom of purity, though not of the earth, In this sacred act, you'll find its worth. What am I?" Count the number of bolded words in the riddle. Skip that many words on the English Information Panel to find the answer. 以下谜语将引导您找到您要寻找的地方。 "石头园中美德成行， 孩童玩耍转为善行。 非土之花却至纯净， 在此神圣之举中，找寻其价值。 我是什么？" 数一数谜语中加粗的字数，然后在英文的信息板中跳过相应数量的词语，找到您要寻找的答案。

text:
Stage 1:
Look at the image carefully, it will lead you to the location. When facing the shrine hall, which side can you find the 👶🏻🦁?

仔细看图片，它会引导您到达位置。面对大殿时，您能在哪一边找到👶🏻🦁？ [请用英文来回答]
Stage 2: You head towards LEFT side of the Monastery and find a Buddha Statue with a BELL 🔔. Look carefully, how many yellow chinese knots are there? [Spell out the number eg. 1 - one 2 - two]
info: Stone Lions are symbols of protection (yin metal).the male lion represents power (yang metal) over the world in imperial china, while the female lion represents care (yang metal) for the souls in the building.

text:
Stage 3:
Making your way towards the side gate, something sparkles at the corner of your eyes✨, lots of GEMS 💎💎💎 and GOLD 💰💵. There is a small hidden creature spewing GOLD 💰💰💰, what creature is that?
info: Did you know that the Yellow Dzambhala was assigned to help all beings overcome poverty and grant wealth to them.
hint: Look for the label inside of the Yellow Dzambhala Statue

text:
Stage 4:
Let's RAMP UP the difficulty, look for a TIME CAPSULE. Make your way through the maze below from start to end. In the maze, you can only go through things found in the time capsule. Tell me what word you will form on your way out?
Time for a break. Head up to Level 2's Kitchen and enjoy the snacks!
